author: DistroTube
description:
Rhino Linux is an Ubuntu-based rolling release distribution that includes is XFCE-based Unicorn desktop, as well as custom package managers to help installing packages from Pacstall, Snap, Flatpak and Appimages.

REFERENCED:
► https://rhinolinux.org/
